review:
I am 32 years old, My mother was delivered by Dr. Pushpalata at Laxmi Maternity Hospital. Today, the doctor is taking care of my 2nd pregnancy. I am so happy for that.

I blindly go by the rich experience she has. Speaks straight to point, understands patients problem thoroughly and gives the apt solution.

******* ****** *********** ********* ** ****** One can completely trust her medication. Hats off to her patience and dedication at this age.

*** ** *** **** ************* *** ***** *****

I am satisfied with the Doctor’s treatment and care.

However, the hospital charged me 2500 as ICU charges, operation theatre charges and surgeon charges. 

I dis not have a surgery. I was given medication for MTP (oral and through drip). I am shocked why I was charged these amounts for a simple MTP procedure. Its like false charges.

She took personal care like my mother. Senior doctors experience is different from the present doctors. Seniors are seniors. With 3 times Ultrasound and managed with little vitamin my 9 months pregnancy. Her guidance makes me lot of confidence. Whether u were rich or poor makes no difference in her treatment. You were patient she is doctor. this is really a very good attitude. Pages are not sufficient to say about her. Awesome

Pushpalatha Damaraju  was NOT at all empathetic towards the physical pain of the patient(my mother). Very rude and did not listen to the symptoms of the patient. Hurled rash words at the family member who accompanied the patient. Hardly gave 10mins and jumped to conclusions ********* ******* ****** ******** ************ The nurses and the doctor pushed the patient(in pain) in nonchalant manner. **** ** *** *** ** **** **** *********** **** the doctor is not willing to listen to the patient *** ********** *** ******* ** *** ******* ** ***** *** ******* ****** ******* ******* ********** ************* This is not a false review. The sole reason for writing this review is to guide people like me, *** *** ****** ** *** **** *********** And I don't want anybody to go through the trauma that I am subjected to, by the whole experience that happened with my  mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
*** *********** ** **** *** *** **** *** ********** *** ***** ** ****** *** ******** We just married a month back and are not ready to become parents yet. After having a false positive at home test, we went to her for options. Dr proceeds to scolded me as I was talking saying she wants to hear from the Girl only. She is of the mindset that guys are only here to get girls pregnant and has zero care of some social and civic responsibilities. We both are in no state to become parents now she insisted that we keep the baby and get it aborted. Yelled at me more saying it’s her choice and that she has to be the one dealing with the consequences. **** *** **** *** ********** ** **** ** ** ******** ****** **** *** ****** *** *** ****** *** ******* ********* *** **** **** ** **** **** * *** **** ****** **** *** ***** **** *** *********** *** **** ** * ****** Thankfully the test at home was a false positive and we did not need any more services from her. 

Will never go back to her again.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: My experience thus far has been magnificent, as these things go. Dr. pushpalatais experienced, very knowledgeable, caring and concerned, and responsive to patient needs. Takes time with patients to promote a level of comfort and understanding that I have not experienced with any other doctor. Does not rush through appointments, but sits and spends time with the patient to address all concerns and questions without making one feel guilty for taking up too much time, and doesn’t watch the clock while in the room with you. Very well versed in all manner of gynecological issues and is current with medical knowledge and treatment.
Doctor is very friendliness after concelt072955ing her our problem solved very fastly and at present my mother condition is good...

review: Dr.Pushpalatha is a very experienced and reliable doctor. *** ********* *** ****** *** **** *** *** I am personally very much satisfied with her treatment and would absolutely recommend her for any sort of gynaeic  problems.

Initially I was suffering from over bleeding and periods problem.

With the usage of 6 months course treatment now I'm feeling better.

review: Service was absolutely fantastic.doctors staff are attention to detail.well experienced and more importantly patient enough to explain each and every small procedure.
I have visited for my wife pregnancy treatment she delivered baby boy here we are so happy with doctor and hospital staff

I went there to meet Dr. Pushpalata but there was someone else there. The appointment on Practo mentions she will be there. I was confused and not comfortable to consult with the new person I had not researched about. Isn't transparency a part of the platform? I travelled for nearly an hour to meet the doctor of my choice and I was told that she isnt here today, and had to meet someone else. I will be taking this further, if I have to.
